```{r}
library(dplyr)
help(package = dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```



```{r}
ggplot (rockfish_larval_data) +
  geom_point(aes(x = oxygen_100m, y = moseri), color = "gray") +
  geom_point(aes(x = oxygen_100m, y = ovalis), color = "green", alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_point(aes(x = oxygen_100m, y = crameri), color = "blue", alpha = 0.5) +
   geom_point(aes(x = oxygen_100m, y = ensifer), color = "pink", alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_y_log10() +
  labs(x = "Oxygen per 100m" , y = "Adjusted Abundance Rate", 
       title = "Oxygen Concentration vs Rockfish Abundance") 


```






```{r}
ggplot(rockfish_larval_data, aes(x = station.depth, y = temp_surf)) +
  geom_point()

```
